content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code > subscribe here 4 ** join my fb group to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns join here 1 this crochet boat garland pattern is a fun and quick crochet project you can make as many boats as you d like to create a beautiful crochet bunting or use this pattern to make a sailboat applique this crochet garland pattern is cute and perfect for a nursery room **the pdf pattern includes written instructions and a detailed photo tutorial ** **you can find the free video tutorial here** 3 - skill level - easy - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - hook size needed 4 0 mm / g - the garland is crocheted with worsted #4 weight yarn **total amount of yarn needed ** total amount of yarn needed color a boat - 50gr/87m/95yds color b sail - 50gr/87m/95yds amount of yarn needed for 1 boat color a boat - 8gr/14m/15yds color b sail - 10gr/17m/19yds **finished size ** sailboat - 5 7x4 in 14 5x10 cm if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2024 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design video and photos in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/6055cb8d4271f096cee0d7c7 3 https //youtu be/eawdo0hjn5a 4 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
